full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 751 Filed 08/10/22 Page 54 of 261 1194 LC6VMAX2 Kate - direct 1 A. I understood that her job was to take care of Jeffrey's needs. 2 Q. What, if any, involvement did Maxwell have in managing properties? 3 A. She seemed to be pretty involved in managing properties and making sure that everything was the way that Jeffrey liked it to be. And there seemed to be a lot of rules around that. 4 Q. Did Maxwell ever tell you what, if any, properties she owned? 5 A. Yes. 6 Q. What did she tell you? 7 A. She told me that she owned her house in London; and that at a later time she told me that she owned her house in New York City, and that Jeffrey had got it for her. 8 Q. Did you ever have any conversations with Maxwell about her social circle? 9 A. Yes. 10 Q. What do you recall her telling you about her social circle? 11 A. Well, she seemed to know everybody. And she told me that she was friends with Prince Andrew, friends with Donald Trump, friends with lots of famous people. And sometimes their names would just come up in conversations or she might be talking on the phone about them with me present. 12 Q. I want to switch gears just for a moment. You mentioned Oxford earlier. Did you end up going to SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00018391
